author: Ellie Kaufman, Jasmine Wright, Nick Valencia and Caroline Kenny, CNN
title: Experts say the US needs teams ready to hunt down new Covid-19 cases. But so far, there aren't nearly enough
description: While President Donald Trump's May 1 deadline to reopen parts of the economy looms, state and local government officials, along with public health experts, are calling for contact tracing teams to start tracking coronavirus positive patients to both contain t…
